title.rendered: “IDF Casualties and Injured Soldiers Update: Recent Incidents and Names of the Fallen”

content.rendered:
Attached is a message from the IDF spokesperson providing the names of two IDF casualties whose families have been notified: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC120220241985725345

Attached is a link to the IDF site where details and photos of the fallen are published and updated:
https://www.idf.il/59780

In addition, two soldiers from the Maglan unit, a commando brigade, were seriously injured in a battle in southern Gaza.

Also, a reservist from the ‘Bnei Or’ command (460) was seriously injured in a road accident in the south of the country.

The soldiers were evacuated for medical treatment at a hospital and their families were updated.
